system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision tool bar separator. Implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_SEPARATOR_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_separator_i.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_SEPARATOR_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_item_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_needs_event_boxneeds_event_box, ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake end
../implementation_gtk/ev_pnd_deferred_item.xmlEV_PND_DEFERRED_ITEM redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_needs_event_box../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_needs_event_boxneeds_event_box: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does a_widget need an event box? do Result := False end
f_is_dockable../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_is_dockableIs_dockable: FalseBOOLEAN = False -- Is Current dockable?
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create the tool bar button. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Create and initialize Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_separator_tool_item_newgtk_separator_tool_item_new) ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_widget_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_tool_bar_separator.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_SEPARATOR note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_tool_bar_separator_imp.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_SEPARATOR_IMP
